snippet: With electricity demand in Brazil slashed by the harshest recession in a century, the government is evaluating an innovative kind of power auction - to allow companies to bid for the right to cancel licenses to build plants....

headline.main: Dying Author Pens Essay With Dating Profile of Husband
headline.print_headline: Dying Author Pens Essay With Dating Profile of Husband

lead_paragraph: With electricity demand in Brazil slashed by the harshest recession in a century, the government is evaluating an innovative kind of power auction - to allow companies to bid for the right to cancel licenses to build plants.
